Directions: Cut cookie dough in half. For crust, press half of the dough onto the bottom of a greased 8-in. square baking pan.

In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar and egg until smooth. Spread over crust. Crumble remaining dough over top. Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Refrigerate leftovers.
Ingredients: 1 (18 ounce) package refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough*
